code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{displayStars}from'../../../lib/functions';import styles from'./BookItem.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function BookItem(_ref){let{book,size}=_ref;let title;switch(size){case 2:title=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:book.title});break;case 3:title=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:book.title});break;default:title=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:book.title});break;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/livre/${book.id}`,className:styles.BookItem,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:styles.BookImage,src:book.imageUrl,alt:`${book.title}, ${book.author} - ${book.year}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.BookInfo,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.Rating,children:displayStars(book.averageRating)}),title,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:book.author}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:book.year}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:book.genre})]})]})});}export default BookItem;
